```js
/**
 * Compares two values
 * @param {*} value Mixed type value that will be cast to string
 * @param {string} searchTerm Search string
 * @returns {boolean} Search match
 */
function compare (value, searchTerm) {
  return ('' + value).toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1
}
```
